bwwExcerpt: Kathleen Chalfant is absolutely remarkable in her nuance, stamina, and ability to create an entire world while sitting in an armchair. She is at home in this text. While it may not be her home, nor is it mine, we've all found our way here. For a random living room and an assortment of strangers, this production and its atmosphere are near-holy.
